glissando.config.group.background.desc: Opciones para controlar el aspecto del fondo de la interfaz del bloque musical.
glissando.config.group.background.name: Fondo
glissando.config.group.config_button.des: Opciones para controlar el aspecto del botón de configuración.
glissando.config.group.inputs.desc: Opciones para controlar el funcionamiento de inputs de teclado y ratón.
glissando.config.group.inputs.name: Inputs
glissando.config.group.keyboard.desc: Opciones para controlar el aspecto del teclado del bloque musical.
glissando.config.group.keyboard.name: Teclado
glissando.config.group.screen.desc: Opciones para controlar el comportamiento de la interfaz del bloque musical.
glissando.config.group.screen.name: Pantalla
glissando.config.group.title.desc: Options to control the visual appearance of the note block GUI's title text.
glissando.config.group.title.name: Título
glissando.config.group.tooltip_line_arra: Which details about the hovered-over note should be displayed on the tooltip and in which order.
glissando.config.group.tooltips.desc: Options to control the visual appearance of note key tooltips.
glissando.config.group.tooltips.name: Tooltips
glissando.config.option.background_end_c: The bottom color of the background gradient.
glissando.config.option.background_start: The top color of the background gradient.
glissando.config.option.config_button.de: Creates a button to bring up this screen from inside the note block GUI.
glissando.config.option.config_button_po: The alignment of the config button relative to the "Done" button.
glissando.config.option.interaction_mode: Note sounds are played on the client side, synchronizing them better with key presses. Other players will not be able to hear your inputs until the note block is tuned, which will happen when you close the GUI.
Like reclusive mode, note sounds are played on the client side. However, the note block will be tuned to the new value completely inaudibly when the GUI is closed.
Note sounds are played through the note block, losing some synchronization in favor of allowing other players to hear your inputs.
glissando.config.option.keyboard_color_m: Note keys will always tint based on their pitches.
Note keys will tint based on their pitches but only when they're being pressed.
The supported computer keyboard layout for Glissando's keybind inputs.
glissando.config.option.open_screen_when: The note block GUI will automatically open when the note block is placed down.
glissando.config.option.preview_gui.desc: Test the changes you've made by taking a peek at the note block GUI!
glissando.config.option.preview_gui.name: Preview GUI
The note block instrument will be shown in the screen title.
glissando.config.option.solmization.desc: Writes notes following the Do, Re, Mi (solfège) sequence.
glissando.config.option.solmization.name: Solmization
glissando.config.option.title_colors.des: The screen title text will dynamically tint based on the pitches of the notes you play.
glissando.config.option.tooltip_title_co: The title of the tooltip text will tint based on the pitch of the note you're hovering over.
glissando.config.option.tooltips.desc: Displays a tooltip over notes when hovering over them with your cursor.
glissando.note_block_screen.title: Tune Note Block
glissando.tooltip.title: Press %s or click to play
resourcePack.glissando:32x_upscale.name: %s: 32x Upscale
